mage ange thuwalayak unama,eya pasewwama ena wedanawa kotharamda?kohomahari ikmanata sanipa karaganna balanne.me sathatath elesama wedanawa athi.damwal da bandala,thamanta uwamana widiyata atha paya ehata mehata karannath ba.duka,wedanawa wenekukata kiyannath ba.nuhuru thanaka jiwitha kalayama damwal walin bandala gewana jiwithaya....mata mathakayi tika kalayakata pera pansalaka uthsawayakadi aliyek gahala hamuduru namak apawath una.wana jiwi eke ihala dosthara mahathek kiwa me minis parisaraya uuta dara ganna ba kiyala.ee nisa kenthiyi kiyala.kisima aagamak nathuwath manussayekuta me dewal therum ganna puluwan wenna oona.anith de budu hamuduruwo kiyayida thaman wahanse namin mewani wada karanna?mannayata,thamange wasiyata hamadema harawagena.budunata shabda puja thiyanawa marunu ho marapu sathekuge sharira kotasak welala aran bera hadala.buddha dharmaya,ehi awasan deya nirwanaya.soba dahame sarala bawath gambaurath apuruwata sankalanayawi athi darshanaya.namuth ada budun wada sitiyanam sathwa hinsanaya ha an waradi de waradiyi kiyawi.ethakota unwahanse wagema siwuru da gath samaharu kiyawi me budun nowe wenakenek kiya.balaya thiyena deshapaluwo eya anumatha karawi,ape rata kanna aapu indiyankarayek kiyawi.namuth minisuni swabhawa dharmaya rawatiya nohaka.oba ehi kuda samajikayek pamani.
